<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Shulsaga](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1147)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Shepherds of the Silver Sea, shulsagas patrol the [Astral Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=8) to protect the nascent demiplanes that form there, warding off those who would usurp the demiplanes or despoil them with unwelcome philosophies. This guardianship extends to the Astral Plane as a whole, as shulsagas not only exile trespassers, but also seek out and close planar rifts. Especially egregious breaches rile these ennosites to the point of invasion, and shulsaga raiding parties often extend their attacks well beyond a portal to ensure the threat's utter destruction. Though often stern and standoffish, shulsagas occasionally befriend and recruit strangers to help them repair planar wounds and track down foes of the natural order.

 Among ennosites, shulsagas are the most inclined to adopt and nurture iotons, forming small family units. Communities work together to instill enough culture and identity for these iotons to take on permanent forms—those of adolescent shulsagas. Each shulsaga's gender reflects of their evolving identity, influenced in part by the blend of traits their communities imparted and their own thoughts.

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Shulsaga](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1147)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Astral" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=14" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 93</row>

**Perception** +10; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), rift sense

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 60 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Rift Sense** A shulsaga can sense any planar rift within 1 mile, including natural portals, ongoing planar spells like [_gate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=130), and other tears in reality. By concentrating for 1 minute, a shulsaga can increase this sense's range to 25 miles.

**Items**
[Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows), [Halberd](/Weapons.aspx?ID=26)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 (21 with shield raised)

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 35

**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)** <actions string="Reaction" />

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
halberd +9 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d10+4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite longbow +11 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 18, attack +10
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Floating Disk](/Spells.aspx?ID=124) (at will)

**Astral Recoil** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Frequency** once per minute; **Trigger** The shulsaga's last action was a successful melee Strike against an astral form created by the [_astral projection_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=29) ritual or a similar effect; **Effect** The shulsaga attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the effect projecting the creature onto the [Astral Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=8), with the effects of a 5th-level [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) spell (counteract modifier +18).

**Astral Shock**   An astrally projected creature whose astral form is slain by a shulsaga takes a –2 circumstance penalty to the subsequent Fortitude saving throw to resist the strain.

**Disk Rider**   A shulsaga can ride atop any [_floating disk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=124) they create. While mounted on a _floating disk_, a shulsaga gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to their fly Speed, and the shulsaga can use their feet to wield the disk as a [heavy shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10). A [broken](/Conditions.aspx?ID=2) disk grants no bonus to Speed, and the spell ends if the disk is destroyed.

**Hop On** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Requirements** The shulsaga is adjacent to a _floating disk_ they created; **Effect** The shulsaga Steps into the disk's space and rides atop the disk. They can also use this action to dismount from their disk.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_3_Locations.png">The Calendar Stone</title>

Drifting through the [Astral Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=8), the city of Yulgamot, also known as the Calendar Stone, remains a sacred gathering place for wandering shulsagas where time flows normally. At this site, shulsagas quarry the stone disks that serve as the focus for their _floating disk_ ability
</aside>
